channel.title: Need more help XD
channel.description:
Ok so im looking through a server seeing what i have to work with then i do to run it and the run.bat just opens and closes emmidiately.
im using http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466353.msg3410481.html#msg3410481
and the code in the .bat is [code]@echo off title RisenChaos "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
is it missing something?

item.title: Need more help XD
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Scaar:

Yea, thank you Im very new to this >_< i feel like a nuisance for asking so many questions…

Well do what I stated above. You shouldn’t worry, I learnt the same way.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more help XD
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You need to take out the (x86) part of the run.bat. I’m guessing you have a 32 bit?

Read full topic

item.description:

Ok so im looking through a server seeing what i have to work with then i do to run it and the run.bat just opens and closes emmidiately.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466353.msg3410481.html#msg3410481

@echo off title RisenChaos "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
